lyric:
[00:00.00] 作曲 : Anton Zaslavski/Katy Perry/Caroline Ailin/Corey Sanders/Daniel Davidsen/Peter Wallevik/Mich Hansen
[00:01.00] 作词 : Anton Zaslavski/Katy Perry/Caroline Ailin/Corey Sanders/Daniel Davidsen/Peter Wallevik/Mich Hansen
[00:04.439]Waking up next to you in the middle of the week
[00:08.956]Never needed anyone to send me off to sleep
[00:13.456]And I know I said go slow, but I can't hold back no more
[00:18.829]Got a premonition, this ain’t gonna be a fling
[00:22.957]
[00:23.327]You make a weekend feel like a year
[00:26.273]Baby, you got me changing
[00:28.588]24/7, I want you here
[00:31.091]I hope you feel the same thing
[00:33.273]
[00:33.640]I want you to be the one that's on my mind, on my mind, on my mind
[00:38.430]I want you to be there around Monday night, Tuesday night, every night
[00:43.256]How you gonna be the one's that’s on my mind, 365 all the time?
[00:48.176]I want you to be the one to stay
[00:50.308]And give me the night and day
[00:52.931]
[00:55.681]Love it when you come back and can't take it when you leave
[01:00.342]Got me fantasizing our initials already
[01:04.558]
[01:04.742]And I wanna just let go
[01:06.873]Falling deeper than before
[01:10.147]Say that you are ready
[01:12.540]I'll get off in a heartbeat
[01:14.431]
[01:15.399]I want you to be the one that's on my mind, on my mind, on my mind
[01:20.149]I want you to be there around Monday night, Tuesday night, every night
[01:24.884]How you gonna be the one's that's on my mind, 365 all the time?
[01:29.982]I want you to be the one to stay
[01:32.165]And give me the night and day
[01:34.715]
[01:35.047]I think about you all the time, 24/7, 365
[01:44.464]I think about you all the time, 24/7, 365
[01:54.171]
[01:59.532]Are you gonna be the one?
[02:09.130]Are you gonna be the one?
[02:11.897]I want you to be the one
[02:13.849]
[02:14.100]I want you to be the one that's on my mind, on my mind, on my mind
[02:18.881]I want you to be there around Monday night, Tuesday night, every night
[02:23.682]How you gonna be the one's that’s on my mind, 365 all the time?
[02:28.664]I want you to be the one to stay
[02:30.957]And give me the night and day
[02:33.464]
[02:33.867]I think about you all the time, 24/7, 365
[02:43.467]I think about you all the time, 24/7, 365
tlyric:
[by:咆哮的小清新___]
[00:04.439]在工作日期间醒在你身边
[00:08.956]不需要任何人将我打发入睡
[00:13.456]我知道我说过慢慢来 但此刻我再也无法慢下来
[00:18.829]预感到这并不是一时贪欢的冲动
[00:23.327]你让短暂周末变得如经年般隽永
[00:26.273]宝贝 你让我心随你而变动
[00:28.588]整日整夜整周 我都要你陪着我
[00:31.091]希望你心情也与我而同
[00:33.640]我渴望你变成占据我脑海的唯一 在我心深处 在我脑海里
[00:38.430]我渴望你在周一晚上能陪着我 周二晚上 每天晚上都那样陪我
[00:43.256]做我心中的唯一如何? 365天 整天整年
[00:48.176]我想要你为我停留
[00:50.308]给我整日整夜的甜蜜邂逅
[00:55.681]当你回家我总是兴奋异常 当你走后总是无法承受那悲伤
[01:00.342]开始幻想着你我的最初
[01:04.742]我只想就此放任自我
[01:06.873]任自己愈深愈陷
[01:10.147]告诉我你已准备好
[01:12.540]将这爱锁进你的心跳之中
[01:15.399]我渴望你变成占据我脑海的唯一 在我心深处 在我脑海里
[01:20.149]我渴望你在周一晚上能陪着我 周二晚上 每天晚上都那样陪我
[01:24.884]做我心中的唯一如何? 365天 整天整年
[01:29.982]我想要你为我停留
[01:32.165]给我整日整夜的甜蜜邂逅
[01:35.047]我总是不停不停地想你 365天 每周日夜不停
[01:44.464]我总是不停不停地想你 365天 每周日夜不停
[01:59.532]你愿意做我的独爱 钟爱和唯一吗
[02:09.130]你愿意做我的独爱 钟爱和唯一吗
[02:11.897]我想要你做我的唯一
[02:14.100]我渴望你变成占据我脑海的唯一 在我心深处 在我脑海里
[02:18.881]我渴望你在周一晚上能陪着我 周二晚上 每天晚上都那样陪我
[02:23.682]做我心中的唯一如何? 365天 整天整年
[02:28.664]我想要你为我停留
[02:30.957]给我整日整夜的甜蜜邂逅
[02:33.867]我总是不停不停地想你 365天 每周日夜不停
[02:43.467]我总是不停不停地想你 365天 每周日夜不停
